functionDecorators.name: SCALING_FACTOR
functionDecorators.description: Weight is scaled by 10.

functionDecorators.name: changeShkoobyRewardsForLpPools
functionDecorators.description: Change shkooby Rewards to be distributed for LP pools.

functionDecorators.name: changeShkoobyRewardsForShkoobyPools
functionDecorators.description: Change shkooby Rewards to be distributed for shkooby pools.

functionDecorators.name: claimedShkoobyRewardsForLpPools
functionDecorators.description: total shkooby token rewards claimed from the lp pools.

functionDecorators.name: claimedShkoobyRewardsForShkoobyPools
functionDecorators.description: total shkooby token claimed from the shkooby pools.

functionDecorators.name: emergencyWithdrawRewardBalance
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw shkooby tokens available in case of any emergency.

parameterDecorators.name: recipient
parameterDecorators.description: Address to receive the emergency deposit.

functionDecorators.name: emergencyWithdrawTokens
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw staked token from pool in case of emergency.

parameterDecorators.name: pool
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the pool to withdraw from.

parameterDecorators.name: receipient
parameterDecorators.description: Address to receive the emergency deposit.

functionDecorators.name: flushReward
functionDecorators.description: Send shkooby token rewards user. Only a pool can call.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the user to send reward to.

functionDecorators.name: getPoolApr
functionDecorators.description: Fetch Pool APR. Will return 0 if address is not a valid pool (or) the tvl in pool is zero.

parameterDecorators.name: pool
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the pool to fetch APR.

functionDecorators.name: getPoolShare
functionDecorators.description: Calculate the number of shkooby reward tokens a pool is entitiled to at given point in time.

functionDecorators.name: getTotalTVLWeight
functionDecorators.description: Get Total Weight of TVL locked in all contracts.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: poolNumberToPoolAddress
functionDecorators.description: pool number to pool address.

functionDecorators.name: pools
functionDecorators.description: pool params.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: rewardToken
functionDecorators.description: address of the reward token.

functionDecorators.name: shkoobyRewardsForLpPools
functionDecorators.description: total shkooby token rewards allocation for unlocked pools.

functionDecorators.name: shkoobyRewardsForShkoobyPools
functionDecorators.description: total shkooby token rewards allocation for locked pools.

functionDecorators.name: totalPools
functionDecorators.description: total number of pools.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: updateTVL
functionDecorators.description: Update the TVL. Only a pool can call.
